oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Postcard
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Color postcard - "I'm Sticking to the Job" depicts a big American soldier chasing down a little German and his dauschund at the point of his bayonet. It is addressed to Grace Lankford, Carthage, Smith County, Tennessee and was sent from Pvt. Adron H. Smith Co., Carthage. From Pvt. Adron H. Massey, Co. E, 150th Inf. Regt. He was from Defeated, Smith County, Tenn. and was born in May, 1895. His unit never deployed overseas and he was discharged from service in June, 1919.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World war, 1914-1918; World war, 1914-1918 - History
